scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run babel
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg-output && npm run pkg-archive
scripts.pkg-archive: npm run pkg-archive-linux-x64 && npm run pkg-archive-linux-x86 && npm run pkg-archive-macos-x64 && npm run pkg-archive-win-x64
scripts.pkg-archive-linux-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-linux-x64 pkg_archive/den && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-linux-x64.zip pkg_archive/den
scripts.pkg-archive-linux-x86: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-linux-x86 pkg_archive/den && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-linux-x86.zip pkg_archive/den
scripts.pkg-archive-macos-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-macos-x64 pkg_archive/den && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-macos-x64.zip pkg_archive/den
scripts.pkg-archive-win-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-win-x64.exe pkg_archive/den.exe && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-win-x64.zip pkg_archive/den.exe
